abstract: It may have started with a bat in a cave, but human activity set it loose.
lead_paragraph: The latest scary new virus that has captured the world’s horrified attention, caused a lockdown of 56 million people in China, disrupted travel plans around the globe and sparked a run on medical masks from Wuhan, Hubei Province, to Bryan, Texas, is known provisionally as “nCoV-2019.” It’s a clunky moniker for a lurid threat.
keywords: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
